name: Reclaiming the Past
description:
You wake up in the middle of a mystical forest. What are you doing here? How did you get here? But most importantly, why can’t you remember anything?
You will explore this mystical forest along with your friend, Chi! Together, you will collect memory cores and unlock your past memories to try to remember why you are here in the first place.
Trigger warning: contains mentions of bullying, suicide, and depression

Program Developers: Noah Schwartz, Jacob Jiang, Ze-Ning Ong, Shannen Yang

Art: Jamie Chang

Sound Design: Merritt Schwartz
